H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6846.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Tahath<SDBH:תַּחַת>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► ancestor of {L:Heman<SDBH:הֵימָן>}

H3569.def: = member of the ethnic group ◄ that is regarded as descendants of Cush, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}

H2396.def: = man, also known as {L:Jehizkiah<SDBH:יְחִזְקִיָּה>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H526.def: = person with skills for a specific craft

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

201.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H1709.def: = collective designation of various cold-blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H4384.def: = a building that has been destroyed or that has collapsed

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H1168.def: = person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H3649.def: = person serving a foreign deity as priest

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H5237.def: = state in which something or someone is identified as different or strange from one's own perspective

H4670.def: = strip of wood or stone at the bottom of a doorway

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H2555.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans behave aggressively towards other humans, ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

H4820.def: = action by which humans cause other humans to believe something that is not true; ► the result can be dangerous or destructive to what was once a trusting relationship

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4932.def: = state in which something has twice its normal size, quantity, frequency, or intensity

H7667.def: = causative action or process by which humans or deities cause an object to be broken into two or more pieces; ≈ sometimes use figuratively to denote the sudden end of a certain condition or situation

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1820.def: = process by which part of the body is reduced to inactivity

H5187.def: = action by which humans determine the weight of an object, which is usually done with the help of a balance (scales)

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H2664.def: = action by which humans carefully examine a place in order to find people or objects located in it or in order to gain information about it

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3190.def: = causative action by which humans cause objects to be in a better state of maintenance than before

H7489.def: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

H4933.def: = all sorts of goods, taken forcibly from an enemy in war

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5193.def: = action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6873.def: = action by which warriors cry with a loud voice, ► trying to intimidate their opponents

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H4751.def: = a small quantity of a liquid

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6869.def: = a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

H4691.def: = state in which humans experience distress

H4875.def: = state in which buildings and infrastructure have been totally destroyed

H2822.def: = state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

H653.def: = state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with suffering and lack of wisdom

H6051.def: = a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7782.def: = a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H1219.def: = action by which someone picks or harvests grapes from vines

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H1364.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H6438.def: = a place or angle where two or more sides or edges meet

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H5787.def: = state in which a person or animal is unable to see

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H8210.def: = causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance

H6083.def: = the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

H3894.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = the flesh of the human body, possibly referring more specifically to the bowels or entrails

H1557.def: = waste matter remaining after food has been digested, discharged from the bowels of humans and animals

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H5337.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from a situation where it could be damaged

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H7068.def: = process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger  for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to

H389.def: = particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H926.def: = action by which humans or divine beings act quickly

H3617.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
